statements: SELECT * FROM landfill_gas_emissions;
SELECT site_id, date, methane_level FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE carbon_dioxide_level > 0.5;
SELECT date, methane_level, carbon_dioxide_level FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE site_id = 3;
SELECT nitrogen_level, oxygen_level FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE methane_level < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM landfill_gas_emissions ORDER BY carbon_dioxide_level DESC, methane_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_gas_emissions ORDER BY methane_level DESC, carbon_dioxide_level ASC;
SELECT site_id, date, methane_level FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE methane_level > 50;
SELECT site_id, SUM(methane_level) AS total_methane FROM landfill_gas_emissions GROUP BY site_id;
SELECT AVG(methane_level) AS avg_methane FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT site_id, carbon_dioxide_level FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE oxygen_level < 20;
SELECT * FROM landfill_gas_emissions;
SELECT location, emission_date FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE methane_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, effectiveness_rating FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE implementation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM mitigation_strategies ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC, implementation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_gas_emissions ORDER BY emission_date DESC, location ASC;
SELECT location, methane_level FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE methane_level > 50;
SELECT id, strategy_name, implementation_date FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE implementation_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE location = 'New York' AND methane_level > 30;
SELECT id, strategy_name, effectiveness_rating FROM mitigation_strategies ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE gas_type = 'Methane';
SELECT id, emission_level, location FROM landfill_gas_emissions ORDER BY emission_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE cost < 1000 ORDER BY implementation_date;
SELECT id, impact_type, severity FROM environmental_impact WHERE description LIKE '%pollution%';
SELECT id, strategy_name, cost FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE cost IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE emission_level > 100 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT id, impact_type, severity FROM environmental_impact WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT strategy_name, cost AS total_cost FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE implementation_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT * FROM landfill_gas_emissions WHERE gas_type = 'Methane' AND location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT id, description FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE cost > 5000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM landfill_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM gas_emissions WHERE methane_level > 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM mitigation_strategies;
SELECT * FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM landfill_sites;
SELECT emission_date, methane_level, carbon_dioxide_level FROM gas_emissions;
SELECT site_name, methane_level, carbon_dioxide_level FROM landfill_sites INNER JOIN gas_emissions ON landfill_sites.site_id = gas_emissions.site_id;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM mitigation_strategies JOIN mitigation_impact ON mitigation_strategies.strategy_id = mitigation_impact.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM landfill_emissions;
SELECT id, gas_type FROM landfill_emissions WHERE emission_level > 500;
SELECT id, date FROM landfill_emissions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE description LIKE '%reduce%';
SELECT location_name, address FROM monitoring_locations WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT * FROM landfill_emissions ORDER BY date DESC, emission_level DESC;
SELECT gas_type, AVG(emission_level) FROM landfill_emissions GROUP BY gas_type HAVING AVG(emission_level) > 100;

SELECT monitoring_locations.location_name, COUNT(gas_emission_readings.id) FROM monitoring_locations JOIN gas_emission_readings ON monitoring_locations.id = gas_emission_readings.emission_id GROUP BY monitoring_locations.location_name;
SELECT m.id, m.strategy_name, COUNT(g.id) FROM mitigation_strategies m LEFT JOIN gas_emission_readings g ON m.id = g.emission_id GROUP BY m.id, m.strategy_name;
SELECT m.strategy_name, COUNT(g.id) FROM mitigation_strategies m JOIN gas_emission_readings g ON m.id = g.emission_id GROUP BY m.strategy_name HAVING COUNT(g.id) >= 5;
